ygData.subject: Re: Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: In Qeynos, give muffins to one of the guards and eventually you ll get a +1 charisma belt Kill a infected rat in the sewer to get an Alligator Tooth earring +5
ygData.messageBody:
In Qeynos, give muffins to one of the guards and eventually you'll get a
+1 charisma belt

Kill a infected rat in the sewer to get an Alligator Tooth earring
+5 HP (or is it mana? forget exactlY)


On Thu, 21 Oct 1999 FalornEQ@... wrote:

>From: FalornEQ@...
>
>I was wondering if there are any good quests that a cleric could do hat would
>turn up a fairly good or just average item? If not what are some quests
>maybe that i could do at a level closer to mine?
>
>Falorrn
>Human Cleric of the 10th Level
>Humble Servant of Mithaniel Marr
>Mith Marr server
>
>>

===================================================
Sarah sarah@...
===================================================
My picture of the world is of masses of people extending gifts to other
people, doing favors -- but nobody keeping score. -- Dr. Whitsett
